thread.title: Auburn offensive coordinator search hinging on internal balance of power, source says
thread.title_full: Auburn offensive coordinator search hinging on internal balance of power, source says

author: James Crepea | jcrepea@al.com
title: Auburn offensive coordinator search hinging on internal balance of power, source says
text: Auburn's offensive coordinator search, nearing the end of its ninth day, is hinging on a high stakes showdown over power and control between coach Gus Malzahn and those with influence over the program, a source told AL.com.
